name: Mazify
description:
How to play:
  • Use the arrow keys to move around
  • To enter full screen press "f", and to exit press "j"
  • To get to the next level go where the arrows tell you
  • Beware of ghost blocks, they have a dot of a different shade of orange, and they break when you touch them
  • Press "r" to restart
  • Press "e" to reset checkpoints
  • This is very rare, but sometimes invisible blue blocks spawn
  • The prize for those who get to the end is a little bonus game that has (almost) infinite possibilities!
  • DO NOT TOUCH BLUE!!!
  • You will learn the rest by practice... :)
Good Luck!!!
